Sandra Nkaké (a mụrụ na 15 Nọvemba 1973) bụ onye France-Cameroonian na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ Nkaké na Yaoundé, Cameroon n'afọ 1973

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ kwagara France. Nkaké nwere mmasị na egwu site na nwata, ọkachasị Prince onye ọ chọpụtara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma. Otú ọ dị, ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye nkuzi Bekee ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Paris na Sorbonne
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya n'ihe nkiri, na-anwale maka ọrụ ma ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nkaké mere nke mbụ ya na The Crucible n'afọ 1994, nke Thomas Ledouarec duziri
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere ọrụ na Le Dindon
Nkaké mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na Les Deux Papas et la Maman n'afọ 1996, nke Jean-Marc Longval duziri. Ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri TV sochiri, mana Nkaké nọgidere na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ egwu ya
N'afọ 1996, o sonyere na ọrụ njem Ollano n'akụkụ Hélène Noguerra

N'ime afọ 2000, Nkaké na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, dịka Jacques Higelin, Daniel Yvinec na National Jazz Orchestra, Julien Lourau, na Rodolphe Burger rụkọtara ọrụ na studio na n'elu ikpo okwu. Ya na Gerald Toto na David Walters rụkọtara ọrụ maka ọrụ Urban Kreol.

N'afọ 2008, Nkaké wepụtara abọm izizi ya Mansaadi, na-akwado ndekọ ahụ na ihe karịrị 200 concerts gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere njem nleta na Africa na Brazil. O dekọrọ otuto nye Donny Hathaway na Stéphane Belmondo's 2011 album Ever After N'afọ 2012, abọm nke abụọ ya Nothing for Granted pụtara, nke ya na onye mmekọ ya Ji Drû dere
E wepụtara abọm a na akara ndekọ Jazz Village

Olu Nkaké na-ekwupụta ihe mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na French soul scene. Ọ natara ihe nrite Frank Ténot na mmemme Victoires du Jazz n'ọnwa July afọ 2012. Na Septemba 2017, ọ wepụtara abọm nke atọ ya Tangerine Moon Wishes, nke ọ weere dịka ihe ndekọ onwe ya kachasị.
Kemgbe afọ 2007, ọ bi na Saint-Denis, Seine-Saint-Denis.
